artists.name: Diamond Platnumz
artists.bio: Nasibu Abdul Juma, known professionally as Diamond Platnumz, is a Tanzanian bongo flava recording artist, dancer, and businessman. He is one of the most successful African artists.

artists.name: Burna Boy
artists.bio: Damini Ebunoluwa Ogulu, known professionally as Burna Boy, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter, and record producer. He is one of the biggest Afrobeats artists globally.

artists.name: Salif Keita
artists.bio: Salif Keita is a Malian singer-songwriter. He is unique not only because of his reputation as the 'Golden Voice of Africa' but because he is an albino and a direct descendant of the founder of the Mali Empire.

artists.name: Angelique Kidjo
artists.bio: Angélique Kidjo is a Beninese singer-songwriter, actress, and activist who is noted for her diverse musical influences and creative music videos.

artists.name: Fela Kuti
artists.bio: Fela Kuti was a Nigerian multi-instrumental musician, composer, pioneer of the Afrobeat music genre, human rights activist, and political maverick.

artists.name: Miriam Makeba
artists.bio: Miriam Makeba, nicknamed Mama Africa, was a South African singer, songwriter, actress, and civil rights activist.
